title.full: Sam  Max Beyond Time and Space

description.full: Join the Freelance Police for a second season of adventure, crime fighting, and chaos.   Sam & Max Beyond Time and Space is a 5-episode trek from the North Pole to Easter, from outer space to Hell and back. Babies will dance. Mariachis will sing. A giant battle robot will trash the streets. And when their friends are caught in the middle, Sam & Max will risk their very souls to set things right. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
